WorkItem.Description:
Hi, 
i try to save my Overlay as XML with 
```
XmlSerializer writer = new XmlSerializer(typeof(CustomOverlay));
                System.IO.StreamWriter file = new System.IO.StreamWriter(
                    @"c:\temp\SerializationTest.xml");

```

I think it would work, but i get the following error:
> Das Element 'GMap.NET.WindowsForms.GMapMarker.ToolTip' des Typs 'GMap.NET.WindowsForms.GMapToolTip' kann nicht serialisiert werden. Details finden Sie in der inneren Ausnahme. ---> System.InvalidOperationException: 'GMap.NET.WindowsForms.GMapToolTip' kann nicht serialisiert werden, weil dafür kein parameterloser Konstruktor verfügbar ist.

english:
>  System.InvalidOperationException: GMap.NET.WindowsForms.GMapToolTip cannot be serialized because it does not have a parameterless constructor....

Looks like i need a parameterless constructor for the Marker ToolTip.

Any ideas what i could do?

thx,
Kevin
